CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL adv 
WITH
	IDENTITY='Managed Identity'

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE src_silver
WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'https://advsalesworks.blob.core.windows.net/silver',
	CREDENTIAL = adv
)


CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE src_gold
WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'https://advsalesworks.blob.core.windows.net/gold',
	CREDENTIAL = adv
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT format_parquet
WITH
(
	FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
	DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec' 
)

-------------------------
--External Tables
-------------------------

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.extsales
WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'extsales',
	DATA_SOURCE = src_gold,
	FILE_FORMAT = format_parquet
)
AS
SELECT * FROM gold.sales
